summary: TAKATA RECALL - IT IS RIDICULOUS THAT TOYOTA / TAKATA HAS YET TO OFFER A FIX FOR THIS LIFE THREATENING ISSUE! THE COROLLA IS NOT A LARGE VEHICLE TO BEGIN WITH AND NOT ONLY IS MY FAMILY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE FRONT PASSENGER SEAT, THERE IS NO PART OF THE VEHICLE THAT IS SAFE IF SHRAPNEL IS EJECTED FROM THE AIRBAG. THIS IS ABSOLUTELY NOT WHAT I PAID FOR!!!
